Package gui.fontMeshCreator

Class Line

java.lang.Object
gui.fontMeshCreator.Line
public class Line
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a line of text during the loading of a text.
Author:
Karl

  • Constructor Details

    • Line

      protected Line​(double spaceWidth, double fontSize)
      Creates an empty line.
      Parameters:
      spaceWidth - - the screen-space width of a space character.
      fontSize - - the size of font being used.

    • Line

      protected Line​(double spaceWidth, double fontSize, double maxLength)
      Creates an empty line.
      Parameters:
      spaceWidth - - the screen-space width of a space character.
      fontSize - - the size of font being used.

  • Method Details

    • addWord

      protected void addWord​(Word word)
      Attempt to add a word to the line. If the line can fit the word in without reaching the maximum line length then the word is added and the line length increased.
      Parameters:
      word - - the word to try to add.

    • attemptToAddWord

      protected boolean attemptToAddWord​(Word word, float maxLength)

    • addSpaces

      protected void addSpaces​(int numberOfSpaces)

    • getMaxLength

      protected double getMaxLength()
      Returns:
      The max length of the line.

    • getLineLength

      protected double getLineLength()
      Returns:
      The current screen-space length of the line.

    • getWords

      protected java.util.List<Word> getWords()
      Returns:
      The list of words in the line.

      protected double getSpaceSize()
